title: STATIC NOISE
author: UNKNOWN SOLDIER
body:
The city doesn't sleep; it just buffers. We are caught in the latency between the thought and the action.

Yesterday, I bought a physical book. It felt heavy, like a brick or a dead bird.

'We trade our silence for bandwidth.'

Stop looking for the ending.

title: DEATH OF SYNTAX
author: A.J. VOID
body:
Grammar is a cage. We broke the bars long ago.

This is a test of the emergency broadcast system. This is only a test.
